title: Violent deaths following disasters: A retrospective analysis
description: Introduction Negative mental health outcomes associated with disaster exposure can increase risks of interpersonal and self-directed violence. However, the link between disaster exposure and increased incidence in violent deaths is not clearly established.   …
content:
Citation: Scales SE, Camphausen LC, Horney JA, Kintziger KW (2025) Violent deaths following disasters: A retrospective analysis. PLoS One 20(12):
 e0337968.
